pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.1: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.2: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.3: akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.7: methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.3: Pañcamāsakaṁ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.4: atirekamāsakaṁ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.5: māsakaṁ vā ūnamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.6: adinnaṁ ādiyanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #2
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.1: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.2: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.3: Manussaṁ odissa opātaṁ khaṇati “papatitvā marissatī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.4: papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.6: sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #3
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.1: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.2: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.3: pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.4: “yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā”ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.6: asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.4: ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.6: upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.3: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.4: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.8: kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #2
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.1: Mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.2: vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.3: vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.4: kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #3
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.1: Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.2: mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.3: paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.4: tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.3: paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṁsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.4: paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṁsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #5
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.1: Saññācikāya kuṭiṁ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.1: Mahallakaṁ vihāraṁ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.1: Bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.2: anokāsaṁ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.3: okāsaṁ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa. #8
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.1: Bhikkhuṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.2: anokāsaṁ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.3: okāsaṁ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa. #9
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.1: Saṅghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.1: Bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.1: Dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.1: Kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.1: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.2: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.4: anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati. #14
